attributes.additional_details: Matt Hancock as the Health Secretary has been disgraceful and incompetent in handling the coronavirus outbreak in England, he has failed the NHS, Care homes and destroyed people's jobs and lives.
attributes.background: To sack Matt Hancock for his incompetent handling of the covid -19 response

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
